subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: In the Mets’ Grapefruit League opener against the Tigers, Mike Pelfrey threw two scoreless innings, but knows he faces stiff competition for the remaining No. 5 starter’s job.
snippet: In the Mets’ Grapefruit League opener against the Tigers, Mike Pelfrey threw two scoreless innings, but knows he faces stiff competition for the remaining No. 5 starter’s job.
